subject: Economy
question_en: What is the formula for calculating Gross Domestic Product (GDP)?
question_hi: गृहमंत्री के अध्ययन के प्रत्यक्षिति किस प्रत्यक्षिति का पाठ है।
C_en: GDP = C + I + G + (X - M) / P
C_hi: GDP = C + I + G + (X - M) / P
explanation_en:
The correct formula for calculating Gross Domestic Product (GDP) is GDP = C + I + G + (X - M) / P.
GDP = Consumption (C), Investment (I), Government Expenditure (G), and (Exports - Imports) / Purchasing Power Per Capita (P).
